クラス ToolTip

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      ToolTip

public class ToolTip
extends greenfoot.Actor

The ToolTip class pops up a "user hint" that disappears after a brief period of time.

バージョン:
11/2017
作成者:
Stephen Blythe

コンストラクタの概要
ToolTip(java.lang.String[] tips, int lifeLength)
          constructor that builds a ToolTip out of an array of user "hints".
 
メソッドの概要
 void act()
          Act - leave tooltip in place until it should disappear
protected  void addedToWorld(greenfoot.World w)

コンストラクタの詳細

ToolTip

public ToolTip(java.lang.String[] tips,
               int lifeLength)
constructor that builds a ToolTip out of an array of user "hints".//user "hints" is string Note that each hint cannot be bigger than about 95 pixels wide.

パラメータ:
tips - - array of help Strings to dispay in ToolTip
lifeLength - - how long the ToolTIp should appear (measured in number of act calls)
メソッドの詳細

act

public void act()
Act - leave tooltip in place until it should disappear

オーバーライド:
クラス greenfoot.Actor 内の act

addedToWorld

protected void addedToWorld(greenfoot.World w)
オーバーライド:
クラス greenfoot.Actor 内の addedToWorld
